data.system_settings: iPhone 6s, iOS 11.2.2 | iPad Air 2, iOS 11.2.5 PB 6
data.actual_result: You just see a "#" with a "?" instead of the emojis
data.expected_result: The emojis should be displayed normally.
data.short_description: Some Apple emojis don't show up in embeds anymore
data.steps_to_repro: - Send/receive any embed with the Apple emojis ❤️❄️ (heart and snowflake, it might work with other emojis) - Observe how the emojis are displayed
